attributes.action: make Ken Dodd a knight in the next honours list
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Less talented people have been honoured and Ken Dodds contribution to entertainment should be recognised

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
